name: American Car Driving Simulator
description:
Do you want to know what it takes to be a good driver in big city with different challenging levels and realistic car simulation with dashboard? Lets play the newest driving style street auto with American Car Driving Simulator

*** GAME FEATURES ***
- This exciting and dynamic game is sure to bring you hours of fun.
- Car damage is extremely realistic.
- It's very simple to drive
- You get realistic acceleration.
- Great graphics.
